content.p: There is a hospitality space within Oasis, Chaplaincy and Faith Support, on A floor in the Portland Building, with coffee usually on the go during term time. Most of the time a Chaplain will be available for a quiet word or advice, or one not far away. A quiet word in a confidential space can be arranged at short notice. A29, Portland Building University of Nottingham University Park, Nottingham, NG7 2RD Tel: +44 (0)115 951 3931 Email: chaplains@nottingham.ac.uk
